p: Healthy adult Swiss Albino mice of either sex (20–35g, and 6–8 weeks of age) were purchased from the Ethiopian Health and Nutrition Research Institute (EHNRI) and obtained from School of Pharmacy College of Health Science University of Gondar. All mice were fed with commercial pellets and have had access to water ad libitum. The mice were acclimatized for a week before commencement of the experiment in all procedures to minimize stress. All mice used in this study were handled in accordance with the internationally accepted standard guidelines for use of laboratory animals. 20
